name: Zeroquery
tagline: ZeroQuery: Just Simple Website PHP Framework
body: # Zero Query - Quick Start Guide ## Installation Download, and uncompress to any folder under your web server document root. Enjoy it! ## Customization ### How to create new pages Create a folder under 'content'. The name of the folder will be the name of your page. Under the page folder create a file named 'index.php'. Thats all! The menu item will be created automatically and you can access your page at example.com/youpagename. ### How to define Page Order If you want to sort your pages, prefix the page folder name with a number + '.'. For example a folder '1. Home' will create a page at the first position of the menu, that can be accessed at example.com/home ### How to exclude a page from main menu Prefix the page name with '0.' ### How to include page-level javascript / css Yor page needs custom css or javascript? The only thing you need to do is create a css folder containing 'example.css' or a js folder containing 'example.js' ### How to Build internal URL's To include template images: `/images/xxxxxx.png` Each page can render custom images that are not in the template. To include page images, prefix the image url with page path: Example: `">`
